about: Tamer and Ali are talking about the release of Extraction 2 movie.

conversation.speaker: Ali
conversation.utterance: Yes, I have! I loved the first one. When is Extraction 2 coming out?

conversation.speaker: Tamer
conversation.utterance: It's set to be released next month. I heard they've got some amazing action sequences planned.

conversation.speaker: Tamer
conversation.utterance: Absolutely! Chris is back as Tyler Rake. I can't wait to see how the story unfolds.

conversation.speaker: Ali
conversation.utterance: Me too! Do you think it'll be as intense as the first one?

conversation.speaker: Ali
conversation.utterance: Awesome! Let's plan to watch it together when it's out.
